page.title: 19POPULATION HEATH MOUNT
page.content: We carried out a small survey in our school in Balsall Heath. 75 children were interviewed. 56 children were born in 14{England,} 14 in {Pakistan,}2 in {Bangladesh,} 1 in {Saudi Arabia} and 1 in the {West {Indies. We asked our parents where they were born. 75 said{Pakistan,}25{England,}18 {India,}15{West Indies,}9{Bangladesh,}3 {Saudi Arabia}and 6 from elsewhere. 20 families have more than 6 children, 10 have 6 children,12 have 5 children 13 have 4 children, 9 have 3 children 10 have 2 children and 1 has 1 child. A survey of religion showed that there were 46{Muslims,}19{Christians 8{Sikh}and 2 are{Hindu.}28 children attend Mosque service after school. 28 of us have parents who are employed and 47 have parents who have no work.
